Articles.Content:
Hi everyone !

Just wanted to introduce myself.
A friend of mine showed me Kerbal Space Program a while ago (ksp 1.0.5 if I remember right) and it started consumming all my time.
So far my most challenging mission was to land a plane on Laythe. It was supposed to be able to come back but I haven't yet understood why launch windows were a thing.
I took a break from ksp. Moved on other stuffs. But here I am, back for a new start and a more ambitious space program

Hello Gryflir and welcome to the KSP Forum!

Good that you came back and glad to have you aboard the forum.


Happy landings!

Greetings and salutations, Gryflir.
I hope KSP is as fulfilling for you as it is for me and I wish you luck as your space program performs ambitious missions.

Welcome Gryflir, Hope you have the time of your (kerbal) life here.

 

See ya round.
Thanks for your welcome
